short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Displays Odysee/LBRY analytics on the Odysee and YouTube websites

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Nomics is an independent analytical service that provides data and insights on LBRY/Odysee channels for general interest and to help users make informed decisions.

The service is created and maintained on a voluntary basis by Dr. Brendon Brewer and @QuirkyRobots, who are dedicated to providing accurate and reliable information to the LBRY/Odysee community.

Dr. Brewer is a renowned expert in data analysis and is responsible for collecting, organizing and analysing the data. @QuirkyRobots is an experienced developer and designer who created the website and extension to help users access the data more easily.

Please Note: Our extension requires the 'tabs' and 'storage' permissions to function correctly. Although Chrome displays a warning message that says "Read your browsing history," we want to assure you that we do not access or store your browsing history. The 'tabs' permission is solely used to manage and interact with the browser's tabs to provide the features our extension offers. Your privacy is important to us, and we are committed to ensuring that no information is collected from you while using our extension.
